step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead. Keep that arm straight and feel the stretch.
Excellent! You're keeping your arm straight overhead. Now, focus on opening your palm and fingers wide.
Great! You're opening your hand wide. Remember to make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Well done! You made a fist while inhaling. Now, open your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Visualize the fluid moving.
Good start for the second rep, keeping your arm straight overhead. Remember to feel that resistance.
You're maintaining a good overhead stretch. Now, open your palm and fingers wide.
Nice work opening your hand. Remember to make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Excellent! You made a fist while inhaling. Finish by opening your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.

exercise_summary: Great job with the overhead pumping! You consistently kept your arm straight and felt the stretch. Remember to focus on opening your hand wide and making a tight fist with each breath to maximize fluid movement.
